channel.title: import BM:Source save files to BM:Early acces
channel.description: Hi I played the mod for a wile and wanted to support the project My Game (early access) crashes when I load a save file from the mod version. what can I do?

item.title: import BM:Source save files to BM:Early acces
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Yes. The mod (free) version and the retail (not-free) version are essentially two completely different games. You will no be able to load save games from the mod version into the retail early access version.

Read full topic
item.source: import BM:Source save files to BM:Early acces

item.title: import BM:Source save files to BM:Early acces
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
I believe the save files are incompatible between versions. You have to start a new game.

Read full topic
